>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/v1/poll/{docId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update a Poll by Id

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"docId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"String Id of the Poll"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"description":"Name of the poll","type":"string"},"desc":{"description":"Description of the poll","type":"string"},"allowAbstain":{"description":"Whether this poll allows abstained votes","type":"boolean"},"allowVeto":{"description":"Whether this poll allows veto votes","type":"boolean"},"custom":{"description":"Whether this poll is a custom vote with custom answers","type":"boolean"},"endTime":{"description":"Milliseconds since epoch for this timestamp/date"},"supportDescMarkdown":{"description":"Whether the description supports markdown"},"options":{"description":"The options of this poll (if custom poll)","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"color":{"type":"string"}}}},"votes":{"description":"Votes on the poll","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"description":"ID of the member who votes","type":"string"},"comment":{"description":"Comment on the vote","type":"string"},"vote":{"description":"Option name that was voted (if not-custom, \"yes\", \"no\", \"veto\" or \"abstain\")","type":"string"}}}}},"title":"polls"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK"},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
